messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Re: New episode of Unbridled Learning
messages.msgSnippet: That is so true!  We learn a ton from podcasts.  Some of my favorites are This Week in Tech, which is done by Leo Laporte from the old Screen Savers show, and
messages.messageBody:
That is so true! We learn a ton from podcasts. Some of my favorites are
This Week in Tech, which is done by Leo Laporte from the old Screen Savers
show, and Digg Nation. There are lots of podcasts for Spanish and Japanese
(we go back and forth, lol; it's not working), comedy shows, cooking shows,
etc. A huge free source of entertainment and learning. If you don't have
an mp3 player, you can burn them all to cd to listen to in the car or around
the house. My kids like some different ones, like the Simpsons, and some
other one with prank phone calls from a radio station.

~Q~
aka Sarah
http://www.unbridledlearning.com

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] New episode of Unbridled Learning
messages.msgSnippet: Ok, I know it kind of *looked* like spam, because it was the message sent by the podcast site.  It really isn t though, it s just another free widely available
messages.messageBody:
Ok, I know it kind of *looked* like spam, because it was the message sent by
the podcast site. It really isn't though, it's just another free widely
available source of Unschooling information :)

Anyway, Joanne, I'm sure this has been answered by now, but a podcast is
just a sound file you can listen to on your computer or some people put them
on mp3 players to listen to on the go.

~Q~
aka Sarah
http://www.unbridledlearning.com

messages.subject: New episode of Unbridled Learning
messages.msgSnippet: Its spam. We ve been getting messages all day from that email address under different names. Why don t you all just click on the link and find out what it
messages.messageBody:
"Its spam. We've been getting messages all day from that email address
under different names."

Why don't you all just click on the link and find out what it is????

It's not spam. It's a really great broadcast of unschooling
information that one of our members spends her own time creating and
sharing. She collects various posts from the lists, so you can hear a
live voice while hearing from many unschoolers.

I'm really surprised that unschoolers wouldn't be curious enough to
google "podcast" or click on the link to learn something new!!
Podcasts are broadcasts via internet that anyone can create...you can
listen to music, news and much more. In this case, it's all about
unschooling.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Re: New episode of Unbridled Learning
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nope.  Not Spam.   It is an unschooling podcast...check it out! ... I m not technically savy but basically a podcast is an audio or video file you can
messages.messageBody:
>
> Its spam. We've been getting messages all day from that email address
> under different names.

Nope. Not Spam. It is an unschooling podcast...check it out!


>
> ok I really have no clue what a podcast is! It hasn't come up as
> something I need in my world, so..will be a learning experience for me
> if someone else can answer it :-)

I'm not technically savy but basically a podcast is an audio or video
file you can download to your computer or to your MP3 player like an
Ipod. You can go to Itunes or Podcaster Alley and find all sorts of
interesting things to listen to from learning a foreign language, to
getting a yoga podcast to cooking...Way, way cool stuff.
